replies.body: This game is a waste of time whats the point on going so well just to get nothing from any shared pools? Fix your system and stop making the top players pick last every round, fucking ridiculous.
u get to have more health then the people comming last idiot :)
{{champion:103}} wont be a spastic and ult a dead target {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
Please fix the load in issue as well, i hate loading in way later and not getting to act on first carousel
Good job guys ! thanks for all the hard work{{champion:82}}

Gold IS NOT a sufficient substitute for an item.

Additionally, it seems much harder to get 2\* and 3\* champs since the patch, were there changes to pool sizes? I was offered a poppy (tier 3) at level 3 today, so there have definitely been unpublished changes.

Please be transparent and PUBLISH ALL CHANGES.
they did post it but on twitter and it got shared around, it was done July 1st so im not if you just were not looking for any info or something {{summoner:1}}
i have a problem where i cant unlock my screen to view other players champs? is there anything i can do to fix this?

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/sLiugQsv-cant-start-games-with-camera-unlocked
idk if links work but this link will take u to a lol forum where it explains how to fix it. i had the same issue
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}} idk what happened but now I cant play without massive lag, its always during the fights, it was fine until this patch hit. Ive got a toaster of a pc but lol works fine.

"Fixed a number of bugs that would cause melee champs to AFK and stop moving"

This would be a nice thing if only it worked. Now we got champs standing still more often that we did before the patch marvelous.

Would also recommend fixing Lulu's ult so that when she ults it won't target the same unit that just died 3 seconds ago and cause that champs ghost to show up on the board for the duration of that round.

there are so many other champions that needed buffs...but hey who gives a shit about the forgotten ones  when you can just overpower more the champs that are already overpowered...(cough* Eve cough* yasuo cough*)

god damn "pools" lmao
Would it be possible to have in game an option to view all the available units && what level they become available and the chance of finding one from the refresh/reroll.
<3 great changes, tho pyke prob needs more nerfing and rek'sai more buffing but all of this is in the right direction

Please explain champion pools better. The published numbers do not seem correct based on playing - some games 2 people get the same 3\* champion, and some games it is hard to make a single 3\* of a champion, even though no other player seems to be purchasing them.
quick mention, reconnecting to a game still  dosn't allow for the end of game lobby to be displayed, it is still bugged {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
Would still be nice to know which item passives would stack and which wont. Like-correct me if im wrong-having multiple ionic sparks on your team wont be of any benefit?
